task.summary: Initial commit. Detecting controller buttons. Added HID descriptor.
Button masking is now setup. Ability to receive controller events when app is not focused. Refactoring and renaming. Renamed HIDController private variables.
Implementing foohid. Moving to thread based messaging.
Moving to driver initialisation and message sending interface.
Formatting fixes. Removed threading. Thumb stick update code implemented. Added timer to update thumbstick (regression, uncommitted and due to be removed).
Listing connected controllers in table view working. Added activate and deactivate functionality to HIDBridgedController.
Added icon. Show gamepad specification in table. Autolayout.

Added settings. Made single instance only. Added status bar toggle. Added settings for deadzones. Added status bar icons. Window management improvements. Ability to defer display of window on start. Begin implementing settings view controller.
Migrating from some C remnants to C++ implementation. Deadzone enable/disable working. Added deadzones to HIDController class. Settings complete?
Migrated C function to C++. Only log on debug builds.
Rename analogue > thumbstick (might add analogue triggers at a later date.). Removed some unecessary logging.
Renamed HID device. Moving deadzone calculation to bridge class. Not working with Dolphin anymore...
Tab bar icons. Changed application icon.
Implementing better deadzone algorithm. Code cleanup. Moving to vectors for stick inputs.
Deadzones working. Using vectors for thumbstick input. Removed unused C++ methods.
